card_text: Activate 1 of these effects, but skip your next Battle Phase after activation;$N●Add 1 "Runick" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Runick Tip", then banish the top card of your opponent's Deck.$N●Special Summon 1 "Runick" monster from your Extra Deck to the Extra Monster Zone.$NYou can only activate 1 "Runick Tip" per turn.
